datan

Class LsqPol

  • java.lang.Object
    • datan.LsqPol

  • public final class LsqPol
extends java.lang.Object
    A class porforming the least-squares fit of a polynomial to a set of data.
    Author:
    Siegmund Brandt.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • LsqPol

        public LsqPol(DatanVector t,
      DatanVector y,
      DatanVector deltay,
      int r)
        Parameters:
        t - vector of controlled variables
        y - vector of the corresponding measured values.
        deltay - vector of measurement errors.
        r - number of unknowns (=1 for polynomial of order 0, =2 for order 1, etc.).

    • Method Detail

      • getResult

        public DatanVector getResult()
        Returns:
        the vector of fitted polynomial coefficients.

      • getCovarianceMatrix

        public DatanMatrix getCovarianceMatrix()
        Returns:
        the covariance matrix of the polynomial coefficients.

      • getChiSquare

        public double getChiSquare()
        Returns:
        the value of the minimum function.

      • hasConverged

        public boolean hasConverged()
        Returns:
        true if iteration successful, false otherwise.
